snippet: The country is the first in Southeast Asia to make ecosystem payments a national policy through a 2010 law that established an incentive program.
abstract: Vietnam is first country in Southeast Asia to make ecosystem payments a national policy through a 2010 law that established an incentive program; farmers receive payments under program that is intended to support economic development in poor areas while protecting forest cover.
lead_paragraph: The country is the first in Southeast Asia to make ecosystem payments a national policy through a 2010 law that established an incentive program.

headline.main: In Vietnam, Paying Communities to Preserve the Forests
headline.print_headline: Paying the Poor to Watch Over Vietnam’s Ecosystem
